name: Down 2 Klown :o)
description:
Final project for the Around and Around game jam!

Controls:

wasd to move 

shift to sprint 

F to dash 

space to jump and double jump 

right-click + hold to grapple hook

the grapple hook makes you go weeeee

Credits:

Level Design: Selah Wright

Engineering: Justin Sindecuse-Hayden

Game Design: Colin Spiridonov
